name: CyaN .Volatus
description:
Challenge your reaction speed in a fast-paced low-poly action racing game!

Tilt your device to evade the obstacles, as collision will result in your immediate termination. 

Collect fuel cells, as running out of fuel will also be... less than beneficial to you.

Features:

- Endless procedurally generated map
- Abstract, low-poly art style
- Low system requirements, no lag even on old devices
- Completely free, no ads or microtransactions!
